definition: various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
all/various
surname Zhu
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)

various sages and ten schools of thought/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others

sentences.english: Among the scholars in the pre-Qin period, Yang Zhu seems to be a mysterious figure.
sentences.chinese: 在先秦諸子中，楊朱似乎是一個神祕人物。

sentences.english: Proses of various scholars in pre Qin times was one of the main resourses that produced Chinese fictions.
sentences.chinese: 先秦諸子散文是中國小說產生的主要源頭之一。

sentences.english: The Great Masters" prose before Qin Dynaety is the important resource of Middle School composition Teaching."
sentences.chinese: 先秦諸子散文是中學作文教學的重要資源。

sentences.english: The views and writings of the masters in Zhou and Qin Dynasties contain profound insights on history.
sentences.chinese: 周秦諸子的言論與著述，蘊涵對於歷史的深刻認識。

sentences.english: The most famous classical ones we read now are mainly texts of Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 傳世的“羣經諸子”，主要是漢人的文本。

sentences.english: Therefore whether first Qin history spread at all the books of Zhuzi take shape heferographs a lot of.
sentences.chinese: 因而與先秦史傅和諸子之書形成很多異文。

sentences.english: The Mohists' concept of morals and benefits differ from the pre Qin Philosophers'.
sentences.chinese: 墨家義利觀與先秦諸子有所不同。

sentences.english: There have existed various ideas on how to classify the schools to which the pre-Qin time scholars belonged.
sentences.chinese: 關於先秦諸子所屬派別的劃分，自古以來就存在分歧。

sentences.english: Getting to know the main thoughts accomplishment of Confucius and other schools.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解孔子和諸子百家的主要思想成就。

sentences.english: Pre-Qin Zhuzi prose is a special literary phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 先秦諸子散文是特殊的文學現象。
